dino__txt_p: The company was founded in 2009 and now produces hundreds of toys. The company manufactures various kinds of plastic toys for children and also exports them all over the world. The toys are made of high quality plastic using modern technology.
counter_card_p2: Experience in the production of toys
counter_text: It has been 13 years since the company was founded. The company employs more than 100 specialists. To date, the company produces more than 350 types of toys and exports to 7 countries
protses_right1: High-quality plastic raw materials are purchased (propellium, polyethylene)
protses_right2: For the safety of children, raw materials are re-cleaned using special equipment
protses_right3: The necessary forms for the product are placed on the machines with the help of mechanics
protses_right4: Sufficient manpower is hired to work on the machines
protses_right5: In order to produce a quality product, the functions of the machine will be adjusted
protses_right6: The machines start at the desired temperature
protses_left1: The machines start at the required temperature and
protses_left2: Each product is packed in high quality packaging
protses_left3: The necessary labor force is hired to work on the machines
protses_left4: Product details are collected by collectors with high quality
protses_left5: The quality of the products is checked by the quality controller of the enterprise and sent to the assembly
protses_left6: The production process is monitored and defective products are removed
export_p: The enterprise is well-known among many countries through the production of quality toys, and the number of exporting countries has exceeded 7. Among them are mutually beneficial relations with Russia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Georgia and Azerbaijan.
contact_h1: Any questions? We will call you back
social_p: Subscribe to our social networks and stay up to date with the latest news!
text_p: Tashkent city, Olmazor district, Karasaray - street. 3
